name: RMXP Data File
summary: An RXDATA file is a data file created by Enterbrain RPG Maker XP (RMXP), a game development tool for building role-playing games (RPGs). It contains game-related information, such as character attributes, maps, events, scripts , and other in-game elements. RMXP uses RXDATA files to structure and manage different aspects of an RPG project, ensuring the game functions as intended.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
